body.name: GRACE KARIN Women's Eyelet Dresses Summer Square Neck Short Puff Sleeve Casual A Line Boho Midi Dress
features: 【Unique Feature】This classic square neck dress for women features eyelet, short sleeve, a-line, elastic waist, midi length, which can give you classic look.
【Fashion Style】Summer dresses for Women, flared midi dress, the eyelet fabric and elastic waist design makes you more elegant, attractive and super comfortable when wearing.

【Multi-Occasions】The womens eyelet dress is great for most events like casual daily wear, work, going out, home, school, party, outdoor, street, holiday, vacation, beach wear in spring, summer and fall.
【Easy Matching】You can wear this womens boho dress with sneakers, sandals, or high heels, it creats fashion for your daily look.
【Garment Care】Gentle machine wash with cold water. Turn inside out when washing. Do not bleach, hang up to dry. Wash dark colors separately, Do not soak for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Me encantó, muy buena terminación, sencillo y elegante, muy contenta con la compra.🤩🤩

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute, Runs small, Size up
reviews.reviewText: The Summer dress is really cute but it runs really small. I normally wear a L or XL in a dress, so I ordered the XL so it would be roomy. I was able to pull the dress on but it was really tight under the boob and made my stomach look really large and not flattering. The dress was also restricting in the arms as when i went to pull it off i couldn't get my elbows under the elastic waist and was worried and then just proceeded to quickly pull straight up to get it off. If the elastic in the waist were more stretchy it would be easier to get on and off. The dress is lined and the fabric feels like cotton. It is really nice, I would maybe order two sizes up for comfort if you are size 14 and up, as this may be a junior sized dress. The skirt part is really cool though, So I am tempted to cut the top off and have a nice skirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty as the picture
reviews.reviewText: Like the color and the design the only thing is it will have tone ironed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On trend dress
reviews.reviewText: pretty bright pink color, nice modest length that isnt too mumsy. I am 5'10", 150lbs, 32H bra, 37" bust - 27" waist - 37" hips, wear size small and medium, or US size 6 or 8 and typically size up in body con styles to hide some flaws - the small fit great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful elegant dress.
reviews.reviewText: This dress is very elegant and feminine. The design is lovely. It fits beautifully complimenting female curves. I love the pretty neckline and the way it comes in at the waist for an hourglass fit. The puffy sleeves are very sweet. It's very well made. I love that it's mostly cotton. It feels lightweight and breathable. Definitely deserves 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but runs a bit small
reviews.reviewText: I normally wear a size 16/XL so I ordered the XL. It fits but only in the most literal version of that word. It's rather tight on me and I don't think it's terribly flattering (because it's so tight). I did have that moment of panic taking it off where I though I might get stuck in the dress, but I got it off. If I had gotten a size larger, I'd definitely keep and wear the dress. It's lined, except for the bottom six inches. It's a cute style and the neckline is such that I think you could wear it off the shoulder if you so choose. The material is a nice breezy cotton and it went just below my knees.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress.... but ....
reviews.reviewText: This dress is nice, and true to size. My only issue is that it is tight in the chest area, if you are larger chested go a size up. Dess is nice a light and has a good length, looks really good with a set of ligth colored wedges.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
reviews.reviewText: I am 5 ft 5 and 235 lbs with a slightly smaller bust than one would expect on a woman my size. I normally wear a 2XL or an 18-20.I was just in the size range for the 2XL, so that is what I ordered. It fits, but just barely. If I gain any weight it will be too tight in the bust for sure, and maybe in the stomach/butt too. Luckily I prefer my clothing to be tighter, so it's actually perfect for me.This dress is mostly cotton so it doesn't stretch at all (aside from the elastic waistband). The fabric is a comfortable cotton feel, and I love the eyelets. The color is great, too. Though I am worried about it potentially staining anything in the wash, so I'll probably wash it alone for a while.One thing I really love about the dress is that even though it has a square neckline, I don't have the problem I so often do of the shoulders falling down off of one or both shoulders. They stay up and are secure.Grace Karin is a good brand that I've come to trust.
